courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Learn complete MERN stack development including React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB with hands-on projects.

courses.title: Frontend Mastery with React
courses.description: Master modern frontend development with React, Tailwind CSS, Hooks, State Management, and best practices.

courses.title: Backend Development with Node.js
courses.description: Become a backend expert by building secure and scalable servers using Node.js, Express, and JWT authentication.

courses.title: MongoDB Database Essentials
courses.description: Learn MongoDB from scratch including CRUD operations, schema design, indexing, and aggregation pipelines.

courses.title: JavaScript Zero to Hero
courses.description: A beginner-friendly JavaScript course covering fundamentals, advanced concepts, and real-world examples.

courses.title: Full Stack Web Development with Django
courses.description: Learn to build robust web applications using Django, Python, and PostgreSQL with practical projects.

courses.title: DevOps Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand DevOps principles, CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes.
